analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa raṇam na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ anārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: hetuyā dve adhipatiyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na cittam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇa

analyzed: na cittam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ cetasikaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati

analyzed: hetu paccayā na araṇam na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ citta sampayuttaḥ dhammo
